This is just a quick post to introduce myself and talk about the intentions behind this blog.

I am a Front-end developer and designer living in Lausanne, Switzerland. My background and my studies are mostly design-focused

since I like to actually build the products that I design. Code is my tool of preference when it comes to

Outside of the tech domain, I usually want to spend my time away from screens by drawing, playing music, hiking and trying some sports.

JAMstack

The intent behind this blog is to share some insights

perosnal projects case studies

focus on UX and usability Design point of view

That's it for now. If you want to get some smaller updates, you can follow me on Twitter.
